title: Studded Leather
contents: text | Made from tough flexible leather, studded leather is reinforced with close-set rivets or spikes

title: Longbow
contents: description | Range | When attacking a target beyond normal range, you have disadvantage on the attack roll. You can’t attack a target beyond the weapon’s long range.
description | Heavy | Small creatures have disadvantage on attack rolls with heavy weapons.
description | Two-Handed | Requires two hands when you attack.

title: Rapier
contents: description | Finesse | Use your choice of Strength or Dexterity modifier for attack and damage rolls.

title: Shield
contents: text | Made of metal, a shield is carried in one hand.  You can benefit from only one shield at a time.

title: Net
contents: description | Special | A large or smaller creature hit by a net is restrained until it is freed. A net has no effect on creatures that are formless, or creatures that are Huge or larger. A creature can use its action to make a DC 10 Strength check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success.
description | Thrown | You can throw the weapon to make a ranged attack with the given range.
